title: Can't Play said Game
body:
Hello, figured I'd try to play league since a friend recommended it to me. I open up the launcher and see tutorial, I click that, and it says servers are unavailable. Okay odd. Lets try battle training. Nope. Same. Lets try unranked. I get into queue. I click on 'Find game' and nothing happens. I wait. Exit, retry. On the fifth time It gets me into a game. I select my champion, game is starting in 3...2...1- Black screen. Client pops up and says "Something broke". I try to reconnect, Client crashes. I'm in a crash loop. I kill it and I try tutorial again. Nope. Nothing. And the game crashes me back to the Client.

I did some snooping. My drivers are all up to date. I even tried the 'delete lockfile' bit. That didn't work. Any suggestions? I can't even get into a single game sadly.

replies.body: The issues and black screen you're describing is usually caused by a connection problem that can't download assets or reach the game server.  Go over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in a custom game to troubleshoot towards a fix.  I don't recommend deleting any files as that can end up causing you more problems.  I hope that helps!
